item.title: 凯雷首席执行官称通胀持续反映强劲经济
item.description: 凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.首席执行官哈维-施瓦茨（Harvey Schwartz）表示，该公司所投资公司的通胀情况表明，经济仍有韧性，因此现在判断美国是否会走向衰退还为时过早。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. Chief Executive Officer Harvey Schwartz said inflation across the firm’s portfolio companies is showing that the economy remains resilient, making it too early to judge whether the US is headed toward a recession.】

item.title: Neuralink 的竞争对手获得 FDA 批准，迈向微创脑植入之路
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的神经链接公司（Neuralink Corp.）联合创始人之一正在制造一种与众不同的大脑植入物。【原文：One of the co-founders of Elon Musk’s Neuralink Corp. is building a different kind of brain implant.】

item.title: 波动趋于平缓预示能源和科技股将上涨
item.description:
22V表示，金融业也可能在反弹中受益最大

。【原文：

Financials, too, likely to benefit most in a rebound, 22V says

】

item.title: 亚洲纸浆及纸张公司为金佰利公司寻求 20 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度尼西亚的亚洲浆纸公司（Asia Pulp & Paper Co.【原文：Indonesia’s Asia Pulp & Paper Co. is seeking a loan of as much as $2 billion to back its acquisition bid of Kimberly-Clark Corp.’s international tissue business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 鲍威尔释放鹰派信息，美国国债下跌
item.description: 美国国债下跌，结束了连续三天的涨势，原因是在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）重申其控制通胀的承诺后，交易员减少了对美联储降息的押注。【原文：US Treasuries fell, snapping three days of gains, as traders pared bets on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts after Chair Jerome Powell reiterated his commitment to keeping inflation in check.】

item.title: 一旦关税引发的波动有所缓解，能源和科技将被视为最佳赌注
item.description: 在因唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战而受挫的所有 S&P 500 指数板块中，22V Research 的策略师确定了三个板块，他们认为这三个板块将在关税引发的动荡缓解后反弹幅度最大：能源、金融和科技股。【原文：Of all the S&P 500 sectors that have reeled from President Donald Trump’s trade war, strategists at 22V Research have identified three that they say will rebound the most on any easing of the tariff-fueled turbulence: energy, financial and tech shares.】

item.title: 德国取暖油经销商在原油下跌后订单创历史新高
item.description: 在本月初原油价格跌至四年来最低点的当天，德国一家在线取暖油平台的燃料销售额创下新高。【原文：A German online heating oil platform registered record fuel sales on the day that crude prices plunged to a four-year low earlier this month.】

item.title: 新兴市场股市因日美贸易谈判取得进展而上涨
item.description: 新兴市场股市上涨，追随全球市场的涨势，因为美国和日本之间的贸易谈判取得了一些进展。【原文：Emerging-market stocks rise, tracking gains in global markets as trade talks between the US and Japan showed some progress.】

item.title: 华尔街寻求关税避风港，Netflix 无惧大型科技公司业绩下滑
item.description: 全世界的观众都向 Netflix 寻求逃避。华尔街也在这样做。【原文：Audiences worldwide turn to Netflix for escapism. Wall Street is doing the same.】

item.title: 关税让企业交易陷入混乱
item.description:
这对华尔街来说是个坏消息。【原文：

And that’s bad news for Wall Street’s bottom line.

】

item.title: 恒大前首席执行官称资产披露使其面临危险
item.description: 中国恒大前首席执行官夏海钧告诉香港一家法院，遵守披露资产的命令可能会使他处于 "极端危险之中"。【原文：Xia Haijun, the former CEO of China Evergrande, told a Hong Kong court that complying with an order to disclose his assets could place him in “extreme danger.”】

item.title: 塔塔贷款 7.5 亿英镑资助英国最大电池厂
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，塔塔集团（Tata Sons Pvt.【原文：A unit of Tata Sons Pvt. has signed a £750 million ($990.79 million) loan, to build what could be Britain’s largest battery making facility, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国例外论贸易是否就此终结？
item.description:
投资者正面临多年来最艰难的抉择

Investors are facing their hardest call in years

】

item.title: 美国例外贸易可能终结
item.description: 多年来，有一种交易一直是制胜法宝：做多美国，做空世界其他国家。得益于科技的活力和美国宏观政策的普遍支持增长，美国资产远远超过了全球同类资产。当然，一路上也有一些颠簸，但通常都是全球性的颠簸。2008-2009 年的金融危机是全球性的。科维德对整个世界都是一个冲击。但随着特朗普的关税政策，我们现在看到的是一个有可能成为美国特色的故事。【原文：For years and years now, there has been one winning trade: Go long the US versus the rest of the world. Thanks to tech dynamism and general pro-growth US macro policies, American assets have far outstripped their global peers. Of course, there have been some bumps along the way, but they’ve usually been global bumps. The financial crisis in 2008-2009 was global. Covid was a shock for the entire world. But with Trump’s tariffs, we are now looking at a story that has the potential to be US-specifi】

item.title: 美国禁止向中国销售人工智能芯片后，英伟达首席执行官访问北京
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.在特朗普政府禁止该公司向中国出售 H20 人工智能芯片后不久，该公司首席执行官黄仁勋周四抵达北京。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang arrived in Beijing Thursday, shortly after the Trump administration barred the company from selling H20 AI chip to China.】

item.title: 非洲 PE 公司在特朗普发动贸易战前将筹资额翻番
item.description: 根据非洲私人资本协会（African Private Capital Association）的数据，非洲基金在2024年筹集了40亿美元，比一年前翻了一番，用于投资初创企业和基础设施项目。【原文：African funds raised $4 billion in 2024 — double the value from a year earlier — to invest in startups and infrastructure projects, according to the African Private Capital Association.】

item.title: 台积电驳斥英特尔合作传闻，称无意共享技术
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. isn’t engaged in discussions to form a venture or share its technology with any company, its top executive said, dismissing persistent speculation that the Taiwanese company is negotiating a tie-up of some sort with ailing chipmaker Intel Corp.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行的贷款损失；制药业为关税做好准备：欧洲、中东和非洲地区未来一周财报
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）下周将揭开欧洲银行财报的序幕，投资者将评估关税对欧洲大陆最大贷款机构的影响。【原文：BNP Paribas SA will kick off European bank earnings next week, as investors assess the impact of tariffs on the continent’s biggest lenders.】

item.title: 美日贸易谈判前景乐观，多数基本金属上涨
item.description: 在美国总统特朗普发出美国和日本正在就贸易协议取得进展的信号后，大多数基本金属持稳至走高，这也带来了避免征收破坏经济增长的巨额关税的希望。【原文：Most base metals were steady to higher after President Trump signaled the US and Japan were making headway on a trade deal, raising hopes that hefty, growth-sapping tariffs can be avoided.】

item.title: 波兰 InPost 公司通过收购 Yodel 加快英国扩张步伐
item.description: 波兰包裹柜运营商 InPost SA 宣布将收购英国快递服务公司 Yodel，以扩大其在欧洲最发达的电子商务市场之一的业务范围。【原文：Polish parcel locker operator InPost SA announced it’s taking over UK delivery service Yodel to boost its footprint in one of the most developed e-commerce markets in Europe.】

item.title: 四月关税风暴令 Man Group 资产减少 56 亿美元
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的关税计划引发的市场动荡影响了业绩表现，曼集团（Man Group Plc）管理的资产在四月上半月估计减少了 56 亿美元。【原文：Man Group Plc’s assets under management fell by an estimated $5.6 billion in the first half of April as the market turmoil unleashed by President Donald Trump’s tariff plans impacted performance.】

item.title: 财长会谈前日元面临更大波动风险
item.description: 日元可能暂时没有被卷入美日关税谈判，但在未来的谈判中很可能会被提及，这使其容易受到更多波动的影响。【原文：The yen may have dodged being pulled into the US-Japan tariff talks for now, but it’s likely to come up in future negotiations, making it vulnerable to more volatility.】

item.title: 中国奢侈品需求疲软影响爱马仕季度销售额
item.description: 今年年初，爱马仕的销售额受到中国需求放缓的影响，这表明即使是最有韧性的高端产品供应商也未能幸免于中国奢侈品行业的低迷。【原文：Hermès’ sales at the start of the year were hurt by a slowdown in Chinese demand, showing that even the most resilient purveyor of high-end goods wasn’t spared the slump in the luxury industry there.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后，埃及自 2020 年以来的首次降息可能较为温和
item.description: 埃及准备在近五年来首次降息，尽管降息幅度可能有限，因为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策加剧了全球的不确定性。【原文：Egypt is poised to cut interest rates for the first time in almost five years, although the reduction may be limited as US President Donald Trump’s trade policies stoke global uncertainty.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市有望结束五日涨势
台积电利润超预期，显示关税前订单激增
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司公布的季度收益好于预期，因为美国关税引发全球贸易摩擦，客户争相囤积先进芯片。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. posted better-than-anticipated quarterly earnings after customers scrambled to stock up on advanced chips in anticipation of global trade ructions spurred by US tariffs.】

item.title: 受中国问题和复活节延迟影响，保乐业销售额下降
item.description: 保乐力加集团（Pernod Ricard SA）的销售额降幅超过预期，原因是干邑受到中国免税店的冲击，而欧洲的销售额也因复活节的推迟而受到影响。【原文：Pernod Ricard SA sales fell more than expected after Cognac was hit by a duty free block in China and Europe sales were held back by a late Easter.】

item.title: 中国茶叶连锁企业茶奇网据称将在美国首次公开募股中筹资 4.11 亿美元
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国茶叶连锁企业茶叶控股有限公司在美国首次公开募股的定价为市场定价范围的最高端，募集到了4.11亿美元资金。【原文：Chinese tea chain Chagee Holdings Ltd. has raised $411 million after pricing its US initial public offering at the top end of the marketed range, people familiar with the matter said, defying a market besieged by trade-war volatility.】

item.title: 关税风暴来袭，铁矿石开采商开局不顺
item.description: 全球最大的铁矿石开采商在极端天气影响生产之后，面临着艰难的开局，而他们最大的客户中国也在为贸易战做准备。【原文：The world’s biggest iron ore miners face a difficult start to the year, after extreme weather impacted production and as their biggest customer China braces for a trade war.】

item.title: IDFC 第一银行将从华平投资和 ADIA 募集 8.77 亿美元资金
item.description: IDFC First Bank Ltd 批准了一项从 Warburg Pincus LLC 和阿布扎比投资局融资 750 亿卢比（8.77 亿美元）的计划。【原文：IDFC First Bank Ltd has approved a plan to raise 75 billion rupees ($877 million) from Warburg Pincus LLC and Abu Dhabi Investment Authority.】
